author: Thaynara Monteiro
title: Vivendo melhor fase, Flaco L√≥pez est√° pr√≥ximo de atingir grande marca no Palmeiras
text: [Futebol nos Jogos Paral√≠mpicos](https://www.sambafoot.com/br/noticias/futebol-nos-jogos-paralimpicos-2024-veja-a-programacao-do-brasil) Vivendo sua melhor fase na carreira, Flaco L√≥pez, artilheiro do [Palmeiras](https://www.sambafoot.com/br/jovens-da-bola/brasileirao-sub-20-2024-onde-assistir-ao-vivo-a-final-cruzeiro-x-palmeiras?os-clb=vejatambem_sf) na temporada, est√° cada vez mais pr√≥ximo de atingir uma grande marca no clube. O atacante soma 20 gols em 2024, e foi autor do gol rel√¢mpago na vit√≥ria por 5 a 0 sobre o Crici√∫ma, na 26¬™ rodada do Brasileir√£o. Eliminado da Copa do Brasil e da Libertadores nas oitavas de final, o Verd√£o foca no Brasileir√£o em busca do tricampeonato. E o atacante argentino √© um dos principais jogadores neste momento da temporada. Palmeiras em 2024 - O Verd√£o √© o 2¬∫ colocado do Brasileir√£o 2024, com 50 pontos (quinze vit√≥rias, cinco empates e seis derrotas); - O clube paulista foi eliminado da Copa do Brasil, pelo Flamengo, e da Libertadores, pelo Botafogo, ambos nas oitavas de final; - O time de Abel Ferreira foi tricampe√£o paulista neste ano. LEIA MAIS SOBRE O PALMEIRAS [++ Procuradoria denuncia S√£o Paulo e representantes do Palmeiras por problemas no Choque-Rei](https://www.sambafoot.com/br/procuradoria-denuncia-sao-paulo-e-representantes-do-palmeiras-por-problemas-no-choque-rei?os-clb=vejatambem_sf) [++ Com Caio Paulista suspenso, Vanderlan pode retomar a titularidade no Palmeiras contra o Vasco](https://www.sambafoot.com/br/noticias/com-caio-paulista-suspenso-vanderlan-pode-retomar-a-titularidade-no-palmeiras-contra-o-vasco?os-clb=vejatambem_sf) [++ Piquerez ainda joga pelo Palmeiras em 2024?](https://www.sambafoot.com/br/noticias/piquerez-ainda-joga-pelo-palmeiras-em-2024?os-clb=vejatambem_sf) Quer ficar por dentro do que acontece de mais importante no ‚ÄúMundo da Bola"!? Ent√£o fique ligado no Sambafoot! Siga nossos perfis no [ X (antigo Twitter)](https://twitter.com/Sambafoot) e Veja todas as produ√ß√µes audiovisuais Sambafoot! A s√©rie documental ‚ÄúZagallo: Voc√™s v√£o ter que me engolir!" j√° est√° dispon√≠vel! Clique no [link](https://www.sambafoot.com/br/videos) e comece a maratonar! Flaco L√≥pez est√° pr√≥ximo de entrar na lista de Top 100 maiores artilheiros do Palmeiras Com 20 gols marcados com a camisa alviverde em 2024 at√© agora, e 30 no total desde sua chegada, o camisa 42 est√° a um gol de integrar a lista de Top 100 maiores goleadores do Palmeiras. O jogador precisou de pouco menos de um minuto para abrir o placar na 26¬™ rodada do Brasileir√£o, contra o Crici√∫ma, no √∫ltimo domingo (15). O jogo terminou em goleada por 5 a 0 e rendeu mais tr√™s pontos ao Verd√£o, que busca o tricampeonato. Uma curiosidade √© que o artilheiro da equipe √© o respons√°vel por abrir o placar na maioria dos jogos em que marca gol. [Veja aqui mais detalhes](https://www.sambafoot.com/br/noticias/quantos-pontos-flaco-lopez-ja-garantiu-para-o-palmeiras-no-paulistao-2024?os-clb=vejatambem_sf). Flaco vive seu momento mais goleador na carreira, e vem mostrando grande desempenho em campo ap√≥s duas temporadas consideradas ‚Äúirregulares". No in√≠cio do ano, foi alvo do River Plate, da Argentina, mas seguiu no Palmeiras com o apoio do t√©cnico Abel Ferreira. Argentino √© a terceira contrata√ß√£o mais cara do Palmeiras No time paulista desde 2022, Flaco L√≥pez √© a terceira contrata√ß√£o mais cara da hist√≥ria do Verd√£o. O argentino custou ‚Ç¨ 9,5 milh√µes ao Alviverde, ficando atr√°s apenas de Borja e Maur√≠cio. Confira a lista de artilheiros do time paulista no s√©culo 21: - 2024 ‚Äî Flaco L√≥pez (20 gols at√© agora) - 2023 ‚Äî Raphael Veiga (18 gols) - 2022 ‚Äî Rony (23 gols) - 2021 ‚Äî Raphael Veiga (18 gols) - 2020 ‚Äî Luiz Adriano (20 gols) - 2019 ‚Äî Dudu e Gustavo Scarpa (13 gols) - 2018 ‚Äî Borja (20 gols) - 2017 ‚Äî Willian (17 gols) - 2016 ‚Äî Gabriel Jesus (21 gols) - 2015 ‚Äî Dudu (16 gols) - 2014 ‚Äî Henrique Dourado (18 gols) - 2013 ‚Äî Leandro (19 gols) - 2012 ‚Äî Barcos (28 gols) - 2011 ‚Äî Kleber Gladiador (17 gols) - 2010 ‚Äî Robert (14 gols) - 2009 ‚Äî Keirrison (24 gols) - 2008 ‚Äî Alex Mineiro (37 gols) - 2007 ‚Äî Edmundo (16 gols) - 2006 ‚Äî Edmundo (19 gols) - 2005 ‚Äî Marcinho (17 gols) - 2004 ‚Äî V√°gner Love (28 gols) - 2003 ‚Äî V√°gner Love (21 gols) - 2002 ‚Äî Arce (16 gols) - 2001 ‚Äî Lopes (20 gols) Compare os n√∫meros de Flaco L√≥pez no Verd√£o 2022 - Libertadores: 2 jogos e 145 minutos em campo - S√©rie A do Brasileir√£o: 12 jogos, 542 minutos em campo e 2 gols marcados Total: 14 jogos, 687 minutos em campo e 2 gols marcados 2023 - Libertadores: 7 jogos, 315 minutos em campo e 1 gol marcado - S√©rie A do Brasileir√£o: 22 jogos, 580 minutos em campo e 5 gols marcados - Copa do Brasil: 5 jogos, 200 minutos em campo e 1 gol marcado - Paulist√£o: 6 jogos, 208 minutos em campo e 1 gol marcado Total: 40 jogos, 1.303 minutos em campo e 8 gols marcados 2024 - Supercopa do Brasil: 1 jogo e 62 minutos em campo - Libertadores: 8 jogos, 384 minutos em campo, 2 gols marcados e 2 assist√™ncias distribu√≠das - Brasileir√£o: 23 jogos, 1.352 minutos em campo, 8 gols marcados e 3 assist√™ncias distribu√≠das - Copa do Brasil: 2 jogos e 106 minutos em campo - Paulist√£o: 15 jogos, 1.061 minutos em campo, 10 gols marcados e 2 assist√™ncias distribu√≠das Total: 49 jogos, 2.965 minutos em campo, 20 gols marcados e 7 assist√™ncias distribu√≠das N√∫meros: ogol. Palmeiras e o Sambafoot Aqui no Sambafoot voc√™ encontra conte√∫dos relevantes e exclusivos sobre o Verd√£o. Reconhecemos a tradi√ß√£o e a garra da Sociedade Esportiva Palmeiras, com sua hist√≥ria marcada por t√≠tulos nacionais e internacionais. O Palmeiras √© o maior campe√£o do Campeonato Brasileiro da hist√≥ria (12 t√≠tulos), e possui ‚Äúdefesa que ningu√©m passa, linha atacante de ra√ßa, torcida que canta e vibra!". VEJA TAMB√âM ++ [ Sambafoot Series estreia com document√°rio sobre Zagallo ](https://www.sambafoot.com/br/noticias/sambafoot-series-estreia-com-documentario-sobre-zagallo?os-clb=vejatambem_sf)++ [Hist√≥rias com Zagallo: Zinho perde a m√£e no mesmo dia em que venceu a Copa do Mundo de 1994](https://www.sambafoot.com/br/noticias/historias-com-zagallo-zinho-perde-a-mae-no-mesmo-dia-em-que-venceu-a-copa-do-mundo-de-1994?os-clb=vejatambem_sf)++ [Hist√≥rias com Zagallo: a admira√ß√£o de Jairzinho por Garrincha](https://www.sambafoot.com/br/noticias/historias-com-zagallo-a-admiracao-de-jairzinho-por-garrincha?os-clb=vejatambem_sf)++ [Hist√≥rias com Zagallo: o inc√¥modo de Careca para a convoca√ß√£o de Rom√°rio](https://www.sambafoot.com/br/noticias/historias-com-zagallo-o-incomodo-do-careca-para-a-convocacao-do-romario)++ [Hist√≥rias com Zagallo: o t√©cnico que entendeu a ess√™ncia da Sele√ß√£o Brasileira, segundo Tino Marcos](https://www.sambafoot.com/br/entrevistas/historias-com-zagallo-o-tecnico-que-entendeu-a-essencia-da-selecao-brasileira-segundo-tino-marcos) Quer ficar por dentro do que acontece de mais importante no "Mundo da Bola"!? author: pagesix.com
title: Phil Collins gives rare health update after losing ability to play drums
text:
Celebrity News Phil Collins gives rare health update after losing ability to play drums almost 3 years ago: It‚Äôs ‚Äòa shock‚Äô By Bernie Zilio Published Dec. 19, 2024, 6:44 p.m. ET Phil Collins provided a rare health update after losing his ability to play the drums almost three years ago.
After a 50-year career, the ailing Genesis musician retired in March 2022.
Seven months later, he spoke about his line of work and the struggles that accompany it in the documentary ‚ÄúPhil Collins: Drummer First,‚Äù which debuted Wednesday on YouTube.
‚ÄúIt‚Äôs still kind of sinking in a bit‚Ä¶‚Äù Collins, 73, admitted in one of his interviews, per People . ‚ÄúI‚Äôve spent all my life playing drums. To suddenly not be able to do that is a shock.‚Äù
6 Phil Collins provided a rare health update after losing his ability to play the drums almost three years ago. YouTube/@DrumeoOfficial 6 ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs still kind of sinking in a bit‚Ä¶‚Äù the ailing Genesis musician, 73, admitted in the documentary ‚ÄúPhil Collins: Drummer First,‚Äù calling it ‚Äúa shock.‚Äù YouTube/@DrumeoOfficial Explore More Taylor Swift thought she was going to 'quiet dinner' before Travis Kelce surprised her with 'giant' Eras Tour-themed party Taylor Swift fuels Travis Kelce engagement rumors as fans point out telling detail in Eras Tour wrap party pics Brandi Glanville reveals candid, emotional details about her debilitating face 'parasite' Having picked up his first set of drumsticks at 5 years old, the laborious activity ‚Äúhas taken its toll on [his] hands, legs.‚Äù
Collins explained of his retirement, ‚ÄúIf I can‚Äôt do what I did as well as I did it, I‚Äôd rather relax and not do anything.‚Äù
‚ÄúIf I wake up one day and I can hold a pair of drumsticks then I‚Äôll have a crack at it,‚Äù he shared. ‚ÄúBut I just feel like I‚Äôve used up my air miles.‚Äù
The Grammy winner‚Äôs son and drumming successor, Nic Collins ‚Äî who was also interviewed for the documentary ‚Äî pointed out that ‚Äúmusicians, people in bands in general, had this thought that they were invincible.‚Äù
6 After a 50-year career, Collins retired in March 2022. David Wolff ‚Äì Patrick 6 Having picked up his first set of drumsticks at 5 years old, the laborious activity ‚Äúhas taken its toll on [his] hands, legs.‚Äù Redferns Want more celebrity and pop culture news? Start your day with Page Six Daily.
Thanks for signing up! Enter your email address Please provide a valid email address.
By clicking above you agree to the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy .
Want celebrity news as it breaks? Hooked on Housewives?
Check out more newsletters ‚ÄúI think that‚Äôs really what it is with my dad ‚Äî is just this kind of sense of ‚Äòyou‚Äôre a drummer, you‚Äôre invincible, you do what you do,'‚Äù the 23-year-old said. ‚ÄúBut you don‚Äôt know it‚Äôs gonna take a toll in the long run.‚Äù
Nic noted that his father underwent a ‚Äúbig surgery on his neck [in 2015] that stemmed from all those years playing drums and bad posture.‚Äù
Phil also suffers from drop foot , a condition that makes it difficult to lift the front part of one‚Äôs foot, making drumming nearly impossible. He now must use a cane to walk.
Six months before putting the drumsticks down for good, the ‚ÄúIn the Air Tonight‚Äù singer lamented that his stamina was declining.
6 Collins, seen here in 1985, explained of his retirement, ‚ÄúIf I can‚Äôt do what I did as well as I did it, I‚Äôd rather relax and not do anything.‚Äù Redferns 6 The Grammy winner, seen here in 1997, also suffers from drop foot. Redferns ‚ÄúI‚Äôm kind of physically challenged a bit, which is very frustrating ‚Äôcause, you know, I‚Äôd love to be playing up there with my son,‚Äù he explained on ‚ÄúBBC Breakfast‚Äù alongside his Genesis bandmates in September 2021.
‚ÄúI can barely hold a stick with this hand, so there are certain physical things, which get in the way.‚Äù
When asked whether their reunion tour, ‚ÄúThe Last Domino?‚Äù Tour , was putting the group ‚Äúto bed,‚Äù Phil replied, ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre all men of our age, and I think ‚Äî to some extent ‚Äî yeah, it probably is putting it to bed.‚Äù
He added, ‚ÄúJust generally, for me, I don‚Äôt know if I want to go out on the road anymore.‚Äù

author: Not the Bee
title: WATCH: Congressional delegate Stacey Plaskett has one heck of a take on why the DOJ exists
text:
This is a bat-poop crazy take right here.
Stacey Plaskett is a non-voting (praise the Lord) delegate from the Virgin Islands to U.S. Congress. And she is literally insane.
What is the point of this subcommittee? Because it's necessary for the public and the media to hear, to try and provide cover for the eradication of the Department of Justice and the FBI. We are having these hearings so that you become immune ... to the notion of the removal of the FBI and DoJ.
It's not like Americans are near an all-time low in trust for their government. It's a conspiracy!
It's not like the FBI censored important information regarding the 2020 election that they knew was true (Hunter's laptop), or pressured social media to silence Americans for wrongthink, or that the DOJ has been weaponized to go after right-wingers.
In fact, Plaskett thinks it's not only extremist to stop paying government agents who actively attack the American people, but that the purpose of the FBI/DOJ is to ... attack the American people.
... to serve as a check against white nationalism, great replacement theorists, Christian nationalists, white fragility, fascists, and the twice impeached, convicted felon, former president, and would-be dictator Donald Trump.
You know what? Now that I see what YOU think the DoJ and the FBI are for ... yeah, let's go ahead and burn it all down.
Let me assure you, Plaskett isn't alone in this mindset. And if people like her get her way, the rest of us will have our faces stepped on by the government boot ... forever.
P.S. Now check out our latest video üëá
Keep up with our latest videos ‚Äî Subscribe to our YouTube channel!

author: Tom Williams
title: ‚ÄòHuge concern‚Äô as figures indicate declining UK R&D spend
text: A ‚Äúhugely concerning‚Äù drop in the percentage of gross domestic product (GDP) the UK spends on research and development should ‚Äúring alarm bells‚Äù in government and highlights the need for further public investment, experts have said. [New figures](https://www.ons.gov.uk/economy/governmentpublicsectorandtaxes/researchanddevelopmentexpenditure/bulletins/ukgrossdomesticexpenditureonresearchanddevelopment/2022) from the Office for National Statistics (ONS) show an indicative drop in the total R&D spend across the UK from 2.81 per cent of GDP in 2021 to 2.77 per cent in 2022. In 2020, it was 2.97 per cent. The 0.11 per cent drop in the level of investment represented an ¬£80 million reduction in real terms between 2021 and 2022. The ONS said the business sector accounted for the largest component of R&D expenditure, at ¬£49.9 billion, or 71 per cent of the UK total, followed by the higher education sector, at ¬£16.3 billion (23 per cent). Rosalind Gill, head of policy and engagement at the National Centre for Universities and Business (NCUB), said the drop was ‚Äúhugely concerning and should be ringing alarm bells for the new government‚Äù. ‚ÄúThe data also reflects that our R&D intensity has drastically declined since 2020,‚Äù she said, adding this had led to the country‚Äôs falling behind fellow G7 members such as the US, Japan and Germany. ‚ÄúThe power of investing in UK research simply cannot be underestimated, and the UK must remain competitive to drive economic growth and prosperity,‚Äù Ms Gill said. The ONS release coincided with a [new analysis](https://www.ncub.co.uk/insight/unlocking-growth-the-impact-of-public-rd-spending-on-private-sector-investment-in-the-uk/) published by the NCUB that estimates that every ¬£1 of public R&D investment stimulates between ¬£0.60 and ¬£1.10 of private R&D investment in the short term, and between ¬£3.09 and ¬£4.02 in the long term ‚Äì nearly twice as high as was previously thought to be the case. Compared with other G7 countries, the NCUB analysis finds, the UK has higher returns on public R&D investment in the short term but compares less favourably in the longer term. The country should therefore ‚Äúconsider how it might better sustain the impacts of public funding to achieve the long-term leveraging effect achieved in other countries with advanced research and innovation systems‚Äù, the report says. There have [previously been calls](https://www.timeshighereducation.com/news/commit-spending-35-cent-gdp-research-uk-urged) for the UK government to increase the target for R&D spend to 3.5 per cent after a previous target of 2.4 per cent was [met years early](https://www.timeshighereducation.com/news/no-cause-alarm-uk-hits-24-cent-rd-target) owing to ONS changes that better captured spending by small businesses. Ms Gill said the high return on public investment ‚Äúunderlines the importance of public research funding‚Äù. ‚ÄúOnly by fostering an environment conducive to research, innovation and collaboration can the UK maintain its position as a major economic player, driving prosperity and opportunity,‚Äù she added. Research and innovation ‚Äúmust be at the heart of the UK‚Äôs growth plan, or we risk slipping behind other nations‚Äù, Ms Gill said. She highlighted that businesses are ‚Äúby far the largest investors in UK research‚Äù, but levels of investment in the UK have dropped in recent months ‚Äúdespite growing in other countries‚Äù. ‚ÄúThe government must commit to long-term, globally competitive rates of public funding for research, as well as work with all stakeholders ‚Äì businesses, universities and charities ‚Äì to create a powerful and attractive environment to research, collaborate and innovate.‚Äù Register to continue Why register? - Registration is free and only takes a moment - Once registered, you can read 3 articles a month - Sign up for our newsletter [Register](/the-ums-modal/register/nojs) Subscribe Or subscribe for unlimited access to: - Unlimited access to news, views, insights & reviews - Digital editions - Digital access to THE‚Äôs university and college rankings analysis [Subscribe](https://www.timeshighereducation.com/store) Already registered or a current subscriber? [Login](/the-ums-modal/login/nojs)

author: Ram√≥n Morales
title: El 112 recomienda: evitar el coche, cuidado con las riadas y los campos con tormenta
text: Temporal en Andaluc√≠a El 112 recomienda: evitar el coche, cuidado con las riadas y los campos con tormenta Si es imprescindible viajar, es importante informarse antes de salir del estado de las carreteras por las que se va a transitar [Sigue en DIRECTO todas las incidencias de la DANA en Andaluc√≠a](https://www.elcorreoweb.es/sociedad/2024/11/01/directo-incidencias-dana-paso-andalucia-110815981.html) Tras las [incidencias por lluvias extremas en la provincia de Huelva](/andalucia/2024/11/01/informan-80-incidencias-huelva-madrugada-lluvias-dana-111094057.html) este viernes, la Junta de Andaluc√≠a, a trav√©s del servicio 112, hace una serie de recomendaciones a la ciudadan√≠a y pautas de autoprotecci√≥n para prevenir los riesgos y garantizar la seguridad . El [aviso rojo por lluvia que afecta a Huelva](/andalucia/2024/10/31/aemet-informa-provincia-andalucia-alerta-111011007.html) pasar√° a naranja a partir de las nueve de la ma√±ana y as√≠ se mantendr√°, seg√∫n las previsiones de Aemet, hasta la medianoche. En la provincia de Sevilla el aviso es amarillo hasta las 10.00 horas de hoy. Es preferible evitar los desplazamientos por carretera. Si es imprescindible viajar, es importante informarse, antes de salir, del [estado de las carreteras](https://infocar.dgt.es/etraffic/) por las que se va a transitar y una vez en camino seguir las indicaciones de paneles informativos y de los agentes de la autoridad, as√≠ como mantenerse informado a trav√©s de la radio de las recomendaciones de las autoridades y servicios competentes. Con lluvia se debe extremar la precauci√≥n al volante, disminuir la velocidad y aumentar la distancia de seguridad. Nunca se debe cruzar por una zona inundada o con balsas de agua. Si se ha cruzado por cualquier motivo por zona anegada despu√©s hay que probar con ligeras pulsaciones los frenos para comprobar que funcionan. Si adem√°s nos vemos sorprendidos por una fuerte crecida de agua dentro del veh√≠culo hay que prepararse para abandonarlo inmediatamente cuando el agua sobrepase el eje de la rueda. Tampoco se debe acampar ni estacionar cerca de los cauces de los r√≠os aunque est√©n secos para evitar ser sorprendidos por una s√∫bita crecida de agua. En el campo y con tormenta los √°rboles y piedras aisladas o solitarias atraen los rayos por lo que se deber√°n evitar, al igual que los objetos met√°licos. En las zonas costeras y con temporal debe evitarse transitar por los paseos, zonas de rompeolas y miradores. El oleaje puede arrastrarnos de forma s√∫bita hacia el interior del mar. El 112 recomienda mantener la calma y seguir las informaciones de fuentes oficiales en redes sociales y medios de comunicaci√≥n para evitar rumores y falsas informaciones, y en caso de emergencia, llamar al 112, servicio disponible las 24 horas, todos los d√≠as del a√±o. [RRSS WhatsApp](https://api.whatsapp.com/send?text=El%20112%20recomienda%3A%20evitar%20el%20coche%2C%20cuidado%20con%20las%20riadas%20y%20los%20campos%20con%20tormenta%20https://www.elcorreoweb.es/andalucia/2024/11/01/112-recomienda-evitar-coche-cuidado-tormenta-riada-111095788.html%3Futm_source%3Dwhatsapp%26utm_medium%3Dsocial%26utm_campaign%3Dbtn-share) [RRSS Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=https://www.elcorreoweb.es/andalucia/2024/11/01/112-recomienda-evitar-coche-cuidado-tormenta-riada-111095788.html%3Futm_source%3Dfacebook%26utm_medium%3Dsocial%26utm_campaign%3Dbtn-share) [RRSS author: AFP
title: Autriche: trois islamistes pr√©sum√©s arr√™t√©s, s√©curit√© renforc√©e pour No√´l | TV5MONDE - Informations
text: [Back to top](#skip-link) Une voiture de police devant la cath√©drale Saint-√âtienne de Vienne, le 24 d√©cembre 2023 Trois personnes soup√ßonn√©es d'√™tre impliqu√©es dans un r√©seau islamiste ont √©t√© arr√™t√©es en Autriche, ont annonc√© dimanche les autorit√©s alors que Vienne et Berlin ont renforc√© la s√©curit√© autour des √©glises et march√©s de No√´l en raison d'un "risque accru". "Intervenant sur un r√©seau islamiste", les autorit√©s autrichiennes ont arr√™t√© quatre personnes samedi, a indiqu√© le minist√®re de l'Int√©rieur. Un porte-parole du minist√®re a ensuite indiqu√© que parmi ces quatre, trois restaient d√©tenues dans l'attente d'investigations compl√©mentaires. Citant "un risque accru", la police a par ailleurs renforc√© les contr√¥les, notamment autour des √©glises, c√©r√©monies religieuses et march√©s de No√´l √† Vienne. "Il n'y a pas de menace imm√©diate d'attaque √† Vienne", a n√©anmoins pr√©cis√© le porte-parole de la police. Samedi, la police autrichienne avait indiqu√© dans un communiqu√© que "des agents terroristes en Europe appellent √† mener des attaques contre des √©v√®nements chr√©tiens, sp√©cialement autour du 24 d√©cembre". Les autorit√©s allemandes ont en parall√®le annonc√© avoir renforc√© les mesures de s√©curit√© dans et autour de la cath√©drale de Cologne notamment, l'une des plus visit√©es du pays, en raison d'un risque de s√©curit√© li√© √† une menace qualifi√©e d'"islamiste". Les fid√®les se rendant aux services religieux de No√´l doivent se soumettre √† de stricts contr√¥les √† l'entr√©e notamment. "Nous appr√©cions tous nos traditions de No√´l et nous ne nous laissons pas intimider", a d√©clar√© la ministre allemande de l'Int√©rieur, Nancy Faeser, dimanche au groupe de presse r√©gional Funke. "Mais nous prenons la menace terroriste islamiste tr√®s au s√©rieux et sommes extr√™mement vigilants", a-t-elle ajout√©, "nos services de s√©curit√© surveillent les milieux islamistes et agissent en cons√©quence, comme le montrent les mesures en cours". Selon le site du quotidien allemand Bild samedi, des services de s√©curit√© en Autriche, Allemagne et Espagne ont re√ßu des indications selon lesquelles un groupe islamiste voudrait commettre plusieurs attentats en Europe, possiblement √† la Saint-Sylvestre et √† No√´l. Selon le journal, les cibles de ces attentats pourraient √™tre des messes de No√´l √† Cologne, Vienne et Madrid. Il affirme √©galement qu'une personne a √©t√© interpell√©e en Allemagne. D'apr√®s Bild, les personnes arr√™t√©es sont des Tadjiks soup√ßonn√©s d'avoir voulu perp√©trer des attaques au nom de l'Etat islamique au Khorassan (EI-K), branche locale de l'EI en Afghanistan. Des fouilles avec des chiens renifleurs effectu√©es samedi soir par la police dans la cath√©drale de Cologne n'ont pas abouti √† la d√©couverte d'objets suspects. En juillet, une cellule d'islamistes pr√©sum√©s de l'EI-K avait √©t√© d√©mantel√©e en Allemagne et aux Pays-Bas. Les personnes arr√™t√©es en Allemagne √©taient soup√ßonn√©es de vouloir commettre une attaque dans le pays. burs-jza-ylf/blb

author: SchoolTube Community
title: America‚Äôs Oldest Weapons Still in Use: A Legacy of Durability and Effectiveness
text:
The Enduring Legacy: America‚Äôs Oldest Weapons Still in Use
In the ever-evolving landscape of military technology, some weapons stand the test of time, proving their worth through decades of service. These venerable instruments of warfare have witnessed countless battles and technological advancements, yet they continue to play vital roles in modern combat. Join us as we explore the top 10 oldest weapons manufactured in the United States that are still in use today, each a testament to American ingenuity and durability.
1. UH-1 Huey: A Versatile Workhorse (In service: 1959‚Äìpresent) The iconic UH-1 Huey helicopter has been a mainstay of military operations since its introduction in 1959. Known for its versatility and adaptability, the Huey has served in various roles, including troop transport, medical evacuation, and combat support. While its use in the U.S. military has diminished, it remains in service with international users, continuing to prove its worth in diverse environments.
2. M61 Vulcan: A Rapid-Fire Force (In service: 1959‚Äìpresent) The M61 Vulcan is a six-barreled rotary cannon renowned for its exceptional rate of fire. Capable of unleashing up to 6,000 rounds per minute, the Vulcan has been a formidable weapon in both air-to-air and air-to-ground combat. It has seen extensive use on various aircraft, including the F-104 Starfighter, F-16 Fighting Falcon, and A-10 Thunderbolt II.
3. M14 Rifle: A Reliable Companion (In service: 1959‚Äìpresent) The M14 rifle, introduced in 1959, was the primary infantry weapon for the U.S. military until the adoption of the M16 rifle. While it has been largely replaced in frontline combat, the M14 continues to serve in specialized roles, such as sniper and marksman duties, due to its accuracy and long-range capabilities.
4. KC-135 Stratotanker: A Mid-Air Lifeline (In service: 1957‚Äìpresent) The KC-135 Stratotanker is a versatile aerial refueling tanker that has played a crucial role in extending the range and endurance of military aircraft. Introduced in 1957, the KC-135 has undergone numerous upgrades and modifications, ensuring its continued relevance in modern operations. While it is gradually being replaced by the KC-46 Pegasus, the KC-135 remains a vital asset in the U.S. Air Force.
5. M60 Machine Gun: A Powerful Presence (In service: 1957‚Äìpresent) The M60 machine gun, introduced in 1957, has been a mainstay of U.S. military firepower. Known for its reliability and sustained rate of fire, the M60 has been employed in various combat roles, including infantry support, vehicle-mounted applications, and aircraft armament. While it has been largely replaced by the M249 SAW in frontline combat, the M60 continues to serve in specialized roles, such as with U.S. Navy SEALs and international users.
6. B-52 Stratofortress: A Legendary Bomber (In service: 1955‚Äìpresent) The B-52 Stratofortress, introduced in 1955, is a true icon of American military aviation. This long-range heavy bomber has played a pivotal role in numerous conflicts, including the Vietnam War and the Cold War. Despite its age, the B-52 has undergone extensive upgrades, including new engines, avionics, and weapons systems, ensuring its continued effectiveness. However, its days are numbered as it is set to be replaced by the B-21 Raider in the near future.
7. The M2 Machine Gun: A Timeless Classic (In service: 1933‚Äìpresent) The M2 machine gun, also known as the ‚ÄúMa Deuce,‚Äù is a legendary weapon that has seen combat in every major conflict involving the United States since its introduction in 1933. Its versatility and reliability have made it a favorite among infantry, vehicle crews, and aircraft gunners. Despite its age, the M2 continues to be used by the U.S. military and numerous international forces, a testament to its enduring effectiveness.
8. M1919 Machine Gun: A Veteran of Wars (In service: 1919‚Äìpresent) The M1919 machine gun, introduced in 1919, is a venerable weapon that has seen action in World War I, World War II, the Korean War, and beyond. While it is no longer in service with the U.S. military, it continues to be used by international users, particularly in developing countries. Its simplicity, reliability, and ease of maintenance make it a practical choice for nations with limited resources.
9. M1911 Pistol: A Trusted Sidearm (In service: 1911‚Äìpresent) The M1911 pistol, introduced in 1911, is an iconic American firearm that has served as the standard-issue sidearm for the U.S. military for over a century. Known for its reliability, accuracy, and stopping power, the M1911 has been used in countless conflicts and has become a symbol of American military prowess. While it has been largely replaced by the M9 pistol, the M1911 continues to be used by some units and remains a popular choice among civilian shooters.
10. M1903 Springfield: A Legacy of Precision (In service: 1903‚Äìpresent) The M1903 Springfield rifle, introduced in 1903, is the oldest weapon on this list still in use today. It served as the primary infantry rifle for the U.S. military during World War I and saw limited action in World War II. While it has been replaced by more modern firearms, the M1903 Springfield continues to be used for ceremonial purposes and is a prized possession among collectors and enthusiasts.
These top 10 oldest weapons manufactured in the United States stand as testaments to American ingenuity, durability, and commitment to military excellence. Their enduring service is a reminder of the dedication and sacrifices made by the men and women who have wielded them in defense of freedom and democracy.

title: Elon Musk planea construir un enorme reactor para dar energ√≠a solar a todo EE. UU
text:
Elon Musk planea construir un enorme reactor para dar energ√≠a solar a todo EE. UU
El proyecto requiere una inversi√≥n significativa en infraestructura, incluyendo la producci√≥n de paneles solares y bater√≠as.
Elon Musk, conocido por sus empresas SpaceX y Tesla, ha anunciado un megaproyecto solar que promete cambiar la forma en que el mundo consume energ√≠a. Su plan consiste en la creaci√≥n de un enorme reactor de fusi√≥n en el cielo, con la capacidad de generar suficiente energ√≠a para satisfacer las necesidades de Estados Unidos.
Este proyecto no solo busca aprovechar la energ√≠a renovable del Sol, sino tambi√©n mitigar la dependencia de los combustibles f√≥siles y reducir la huella de carbono.
El megaproyecto solar de Elon Musk
A pesar de la promesa de una energ√≠a m√°s limpia y sostenible, el proyecto requiere una inversi√≥n significativa en infraestructura, incluyendo la producci√≥n de paneles solares y bater√≠as.
Musk, quien ya ha incursionado en el sector solar con la adquisici√≥n de SolarCity y la oferta de soluciones de energ√≠a solar a trav√©s de Tesla, ve esto no solo como una necesidad ambiental, sino tambi√©n como una oportunidad de negocio.
La implementaci√≥n de este megaproyecto solar plantea varios desaf√≠os, desde la log√≠stica de construcci√≥n hasta el impacto ambiental y social de una planta de tal magnitud.
Adem√°s, la transici√≥n a la energ√≠a solar a gran escala requerir√° cambios significativos en la infraestructura energ√©tica actual y la adopci√≥n de nuevas tecnolog√≠as.
Si se lleva a cabo con √©xito, el proyecto de Musk podr√≠a ser un modelo para otros pa√≠ses y podr√≠a tener un impacto profundo en la reducci√≥n de las emisiones de gases de efecto invernadero. Adem√°s, podr√≠a estimular la innovaci√≥n en el almacenamiento de energ√≠a y en la eficiencia de los paneles solares.

Elimina bots de Twitter (X)](/tecnologia/2024/04/04/elon-musk-cumple-deseo-de-amlo-elimina-bots-de-twitter-x/)

author: Informazione.it - Comunicati Stampa
title: Shohei Ohtani diventa il nuovo brand ambassador di Beats
text: Shohei Ohtani diventa il nuovo brand ambassador di Beats Comunicato Precedente Comunicato Successivo [informazione.it - comunicati stampa - sport](/comunicati-stampa/it/sport)) Beats by Dr. Dre (Beats) ha annunciato oggi di aver designato come suo brand ambassador ufficiale Shohei Ohtani, la superstar della Major League di baseball e dei Los Angeles Dodgers. In tale ruolo, Ohtani apparir√† nelle campagne di marketing di Beats che mettono in risalto la dinamica linea di prodotti del marchio. Questo comunicato stampa include contenuti multimediali. Visualizzare l‚Äôintero comunicato qui: https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20240904827985/it/ Shohei Ohtani wearing Beats Solo Buds true wireless earphones (Photo: Business Wire) "In quanto ambassador di Beats, sono davvero onorato di lavorare con atleti incredibili come Lebron James e Lionel Messi", ha dichiarato Shohei Ohtani. "Sono entusiasta delle nuove opportunit√† che offrir√† questa partnership". Informazioni su Beats Beats by Dr. Dre (Beats) √® un marchio audio leader fondato nel 2006 da Dr. Dre e Jimmy Iovine. Con la sua serie premium di cuffie, auricolari e altoparlanti, Beats ha introdotto una generazione completamente nuova alle possibilit√† dell'intrattenimento sonoro di alta qualit√†. Il successo ininterrotto del marchio contribuisce a trasmettere l'energia, l'emozione e l'entusiasmo della riproduzione in studio di registrazione nell'esperienza di ascolto degli amanti della musica in tutto il mondo. Beats √® stata acquisita da Apple Inc. nel luglio 2014. Il testo originale del presente annuncio, redatto nella lingua di partenza, √® la versione ufficiale che fa fede. Le traduzioni sono offerte unicamente per comodit√† del lettore e devono rinviare al testo in lingua originale, che √® l'unico giuridicamente valido. Vedi la versione originale su businesswire.com: https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20240904827985/it/ [Business Wire (Leggi tutti i comunicati)](/comunicati-stampa/a/DFEED26D-3601-40BE-A6C8-9904F2DEB6BE/Business-Wire) 40 East 52nd Street, 14th Floor 10022 New York Stati Uniti [Slide Show](#)
